protein.specific_function: Responsible for the degradation of GM2 gangliosides, and a variety of other molecules containing terminal N-acetyl hexosamines, in the brain and other tissues. The form B is active against certain oligosaccharides. The form S has no measurable activity.

pathway.name: Amino sugar and nucleotide sugar metabolism

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on glycosyl bonds
cell morphogenesis involved in neuron differentiation
